title: Degradation of Carbamazepine and Sulfamethoxazole in Water by Dielectric Barrier Discharge Plasma Coupled with Far UV-C (222 nm) System
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00564C, Paper
Kiran Ahlawat, Ramavtar Jangra, Ram Prakash
Organic micropollutants (OMPs) are now frequently found in wastewater and pose a risk to human and environmental health. This study utilizes an in-house developed plasma source and KrCl* excilamp (far...
